meanings.definition: The cost of traveling by car
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to budget for carfare when planning a road trip.
meanings.sent2: She handed the driver the exact carfare amount before getting into the taxi.
meanings.sent3: The carfare for the journey was surprisingly affordable, much to my delight.
meanings.sent4: The carfare felt like a toll I had to pay to the road for its services.
meanings.sent5: The carfare sign at the bus stop was clear and easy to read, making it convenient for passengers.

meanings.definition: Money paid for transportation by car
meanings.sent1: He always kept spare change in his pocket for unexpected carfare needs.
meanings.sent2: The carfare for the shuttle service was included in the hotel package.
meanings.sent3: Paying the carfare with a handful of coins made the driver chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her carfare contribution helped cover the gas expenses for the group trip.
meanings.sent5: The carfare receipt served as a reminder of the smooth ride she had enjoyed.
